farmingAdvice.coldConditions: Cold conditions. Protect sensitive crops from frost damage.
farmingAdvice.hotConditions: Extreme heat warning. Irrigate crops early morning or late evening.
farmingAdvice.highHumidity: High humidity and temperature. Monitor for fungal diseases.
farmingAdvice.coolHumid: Cool and humid conditions. Good for vegetables but watch for fungal growth.
farmingAdvice.strongWinds: Strong winds detected. Secure greenhouse covers and support tall crops.
farmingAdvice.heavyRain: Heavy rain expected. Postpone field work and ensure proper drainage.
farmingAdvice.goodConditions: Good conditions for field work. UV protection recommended during peak hours.

irrigationAdvice.soon: Based on current evapotranspiration and soil moisture, irrigate 20-25mm in the next 2 days.
irrigationAdvice.adequate: Soil moisture is adequate. Monitor conditions and irrigate when moisture drops below 60%.

farmingAdvice.coldConditions: 추운 날씨입니다. 서리에 민감한 작물을 보호하세요.
farmingAdvice.hotConditions: 폭염 경보. 이른 아침이나 늦은 저녁에 관개하세요.
farmingAdvice.coolHumid: 서늘하고 습합니다. 채소 재배에 좋지만 곰팡이 주의하세요.
farmingAdvice.strongWinds: 강풍 주의. 온실 덮개를 고정하고 키 큰 작물을 지지하세요.
farmingAdvice.heavyRain: 폭우 예상. 야외 작업을 연기하고 배수를 확인하세요.
farmingAdvice.goodConditions: 야외 작업하기 좋은 날씨입니다. 자외선 차단에 유의하세요.

irrigationAdvice.soon: 증발산량과 토양수분을 고려해 2일 내 20-25mm 관개 권장.
irrigationAdvice.adequate: 토양 수분이 적절합니다. 60% 이하로 떨어지면 관개하세요.

sw.noActiveAlerts: Hakuna tahadhari za hali ya hewa

farmingAdvice.coldConditions: Baridi kali. Linda mazao dhaifu dhidi ya barafu.
farmingAdvice.hotConditions: Onyo la joto kali. Mwagilia mazao asubuhi mapema au jioni.
farmingAdvice.highHumidity: Unyevunyevu mkubwa na joto. Chunguza magonjwa ya kuvu.
farmingAdvice.coolHumid: Baridi na unyevunyevu. Nzuri kwa mboga lakini chunguza kuvu.
farmingAdvice.strongWinds: Upepo mkali. Linda mabanda na tilia nguzo mazao marefu.
farmingAdvice.heavyRain: Mvua kubwa inatarajiwa. Ahirisha kazi za shambani na hakikisha mifereji.
farmingAdvice.goodConditions: Hali nzuri ya kufanya kazi shambani. Jikinge na jua kali.

irrigationAdvice.critical: Muhimu: Mwagilia sasa hivi. Tumia maji 30-40mm.
irrigationAdvice.soon: Kutokana na uvukizaji na unyevunyevu wa udongo, mwagilia 20-25mm ndani ya siku 2.
irrigationAdvice.adequate: Unyevunyevu wa udongo unatosha. Fuatilia na umwagilie ukishuka chini ya 60%.

farmingAdvice.coldConditions: Conditions froides. Protégez les cultures sensibles du gel.
farmingAdvice.hotConditions: Alerte canicule. Irriguez tôt le matin ou tard le soir.
farmingAdvice.highHumidity: Humidité et température élevées. Surveillez les maladies fongiques.
farmingAdvice.coolHumid: Frais et humide. Bon pour les légumes mais surveillez les champignons.
farmingAdvice.strongWinds: Vents forts. Sécurisez les serres et soutenez les cultures hautes.
farmingAdvice.heavyRain: Fortes pluies prévues. Reportez les travaux et vérifiez le drainage.
farmingAdvice.goodConditions: Bonnes conditions pour les travaux. Protection UV recommandée.

irrigationAdvice.soon: Selon l'évapotranspiration et l'humidité du sol, irriguez 20-25mm dans 2 jours.
irrigationAdvice.adequate: L'humidité du sol est adéquate. Surveillez et irriguez sous 60%.

farmingAdvice.coldConditions: चिसो अवस्था। संवेदनशील बालीलाई शीतबाट जोगाउनुहोस्।
farmingAdvice.hotConditions: अत्यधिक गर्मी चेतावनी। बिहान सबेरै वा साँझ सिंचाई गर्नुहोस्।
farmingAdvice.highHumidity: उच्च आर्द्रता र तापक्रम। ढुसी रोगहरूको निगरानी गर्नुहोस्।
farmingAdvice.coolHumid: चिसो र आर्द्र अवस्था। तरकारीका लागि राम्रो तर ढुसीबाट सावधान।
farmingAdvice.strongWinds: तीव्र हावा। ग्रीनहाउस ढाक्नुहोस् र अग्लो बालीलाई सहारा दिनुहोस्।
farmingAdvice.heavyRain: भारी वर्षा अपेक्षित। खेत कार्य स्थगित गर्नुहोस् र निकास सुनिश्चित गर्नुहोस्।
farmingAdvice.goodConditions: खेत कार्यका लागि राम्रो अवस्था। UV सुरक्षा सिफारिस गरिएको।

irrigationAdvice.critical: गम्भीर: तुरुन्त सिंचाई गर्नुहोस्। ३०-४० मिमी पानी दिनुहोस्।
irrigationAdvice.soon: वाष्पीकरण र माटो आर्द्रताका आधारमा २ दिनभित्र २०-२५ मिमी सिंचाई गर्नुहोस्।
irrigationAdvice.adequate: माटो आर्द्रता पर्याप्त छ। ६०% भन्दा कम हुँदा सिंचाई गर्नुहोस्।

farmingAdvice.coldConditions: Sovuq sharoit. Sezgir ekinlarni sovuqdan himoya qiling.
farmingAdvice.hotConditions: Haddan tashqari issiqlik ogohlantirishi. Erta tongda yoki kech kechqurun sug'oring.
farmingAdvice.highHumidity: Yuqori namlik va harorat. Qo'ziqorin kasalliklarini kuzating.
farmingAdvice.coolHumid: Salqin va nam sharoit. Sabzavotlar uchun yaxshi, lekin qo'ziqorindan ehtiyot bo'ling.
farmingAdvice.strongWinds: Kuchli shamollar. Issiqxona qopqoqlarini mahkamlang va baland ekinlarni qo'llab-quvvatlang.
farmingAdvice.heavyRain: Kuchli yomg'ir kutilmoqda. Dala ishlarini kechiktiring va drenajni ta'minlang.
farmingAdvice.goodConditions: Dala ishlari uchun yaxshi sharoit. UV himoyasi tavsiya etiladi.

irrigationAdvice.soon: Bug'lanish va tuproq namligiga asoslanib, 2 kun ichida 20-25mm sug'oring.
irrigationAdvice.adequate: Tuproq namligi etarli. Kuzating va 60% dan pastga tushganda sug'oring.
